lead_paragraph: By DIANA HENRIQUES and GUILBERT GATES
snippet: From the DealBook Spring 2010 Special Section: DealBook lays out in a comprehensive graphic the prosecutors’ description of how one of the biggest insider trading rings in recent memory worked.

headline.main: A Web of Insider Trading Charges
